text: Johanna Margaret Jeanette Bonnier, (January 23, 1934 – April 16, 2016),Jeanette Bonnier har avliditVi är för alltid din tidning, Jeanette was a Swedish media proprietor, journalist and author. She was the daughter of the publisher Albert Bonnier Jr. and Birgit Flodquist and the sister of Charlotte Bonnier. She was known because she held one of the largest stakes of the Bonnier Group. She was a journalist for Expressen. Bonnier died in Stockholm, Sweden from heart failure on April 16, 2016, aged 82. ==References== ==Other websites== *Info at Bonnier.com Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Swedish writers Category:Swedish journalists
title: Jeanette Bonnier
